SELECT
FROM ( select c.id as cid,c.collect_time,x.* from favorites c inner join goods x
on c.fid = x.mid
on c.fid = x.id
and c.type = #{type} and uid = #{uid}
and (select count(*) from goods t where x.mid = t.mid and x.up_time > t.up_time and t.state=1 ) < 3
and c.fid in ( select n.fid from (select fid from favorites where type = '1' and uid = #{uid} order by collect_time desc limit #{from},#{to}) n)
order by c.fid ) g LEFT JOIN goods_detail d ON g.id=d.gid LEFT JOIN goods_strategy s ON g.id=s.gid LEFT JOIN strategy t ON s.sid=t.id LEFT JOIN goods_brand b ON b.id=g.bid LEFT JOIN goods_img i ON g.id=i.gid LEFT JOIN merchant m ON g.mid=m.id LEFT JOIN goods_type p ON p.id = g.tid where 1=1 AND g.state=1 order by g.collect_time desc,g.mid
limit #{from},#{to}
